text: Queen Christina is a 1933 American biographical romantic drama movie directed by Rouben Mamoulian and stars Greta Garbo, John Gilbert, Ian Keith, Lewis Stone, C. Aubrey Smith, Reginald Owen. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1933 romance movies Category:1933 drama movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Rouben Mamoulian Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies set in Sweden
title: Queen Christina (movie)
